markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spear Frog Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2015)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Injury" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=97" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=126" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Two Actions" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Harvested from the skin of the poisonous [spear frog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=674), this toxin causes a burning rash and weakness in the limbs. Each frog yields enough toxin to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) one dose of spear frog poison.

 **Saving Throw** DC 15 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** 1d4 poison damage (1 round); **Stage 2** 1d6 poison damage and [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) (1 round)

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spear Frog Poison
